data.title: DanielTammet.NET
data.text:
Past schedule

Daniel Tammet has spoken at events around the world. He is represented by the JLA Agency (UK/Europe). For North America and other territories, contact Daniel Tammet’s office directly.

2019

Biennal Ciutat i Ciencia, Barcelona, February 2019

Théâtre du Rond Point, Paris, February 2019

Partages du Savoir, Gaillard, March 2019
